pinyin: cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 yu2

definitions.cheng2 men2 shi1 huo3 , yang1 ji2 chi2 y: a fire in the city gates is also a calamity for the fish in the moat (idiom); the bystander will also suffer; fig. you can't escape responsibility for your actions; ask not for whom the bell tolls - it tolls for thee;
